name: DK The New Way Things Work
name_original: DK The New Way Things Work
description:
Learn about mega machines, amazing inventions, and cool gadgets! From the earliest tools to the latest technology... Bursting with cool machines, packed with movies and animations, and loaded with all kinds of gizmos, this journey with author/illustrator David Macaulay explores the fascinating world of history's greatest inventors and explains the workings of more than 150 of their machines and inventions.

Visit the Mammoth Storeroom packed with postcards, stationery, sounds, and pictures; or travel with the Great Woolly Mammoth as you uncover the most brilliant and significant inventions from 7,000 BC to the present. Includes a virtual landscape full of clickable items, a 3D terrain map with thousands of links to help you resolve the most puzzling scientific questions—plus you can visit the Mammoth School House to test yourself on all the new and interesting knowledge you've just gained!

(Source of Description - Amazon; 'DK The New Way Things Work')
